section.title: Installazione d’OmegaT
section.para: OmegaT hè distribuitu in duie edizioni :

listitem.para: St’edizione hè ricumandata per un impiegu d’ogni ghjornu.
St’edizione hè ingenerata autumaticamente ogni volta chè un codice novu hè aghjuntu à OmegaT. Hà da esse impiegata solu in un scopu di prova.

section.para: The files are downloadable directly from https://omegat.org.

note.para: OmegaT 6.1.0 requires a Java 11 Runtime Environment (JRE) to run.
I pacchetti d’OmegaT sò dispunibule in versioni impacchittati cù Java, è d’altre senza Java. Packages without Java rely on a Java 11 Runtime Environment installed systemwide.
OmegaT 5.8.0 and later can also run with Java 11 Runtime Environment on any platform.

Due to licensing considerations, the OmegaT team recommends the Eclipse Temurin Java runtime provided by the Eclipse Foundation's Adoptium Project, but any Java 8 compatible runtime environment should work. See The Eclipse Temurin™ project.
IBM provides JREs for Linux PowerPC at .

section.title: Nant’à Windows
section.para: Fate un cliccu doppiu nant’à u pacchettu chì vo avete scaricatu.
Si pò sceglie a lingua impiegata durante l’installazione è quella impiegata da OmegaT. You can also change this later by editing the OmegaT.l4J.ini file.

section.title: Nant’à Linux
section.para: Certe distribuzioni Linux furniscenu OmegaT in u so ghjestiunariu di pacchettu. The instructions given here apply to people who download the package from the https://omegat.org site and install it manually.

Spacchittate o scumprimite u schedariu chì vo avete scaricatu. S’azzione hà da creà un cartulare novu chjamatu secondu à u nome di u pacchettu scaricatu. ’Ssu cartulare cuntenerà tutti i schedarii necessarii per fà funziunà OmegaT.

note.para: Although you can run OmegaT directly from the available files, you can also run the linux-install.sh script found there to have OmegaT installed in more appropriate locations.
Running the script will require you to enter your sudo password.

The script checks for an existing installation of the same OmegaT version in /opt/omegat/. If there isn’t one, it installs the program in /opt/omegat/OmegaT_&vernb; and sets it as the default version (in /opt/omegat/OmegaT-default).

section.para: Dopu chè a scumpressione o l’installazione serà compia, si pò squassà u schedariu scaricatu perchè ùn serà mai più richiestu.

section.title: Nant’à macOS
section.para: Fate un cliccu doppiu nant’à u pacchettu chì vo avete scaricatu. This creates a folder called OmegaT. The folder contains two files: index.html (the user manual entry file) and OmegaT.app (the application). Copy the folder to a suitable location (e.g. Applications).
If so desired, drag and drop OmegaT.app onto the Dock for easier access.
Quandu què serà compiu, si pò squassà u pacchettu scaricatu perchè ùn serà mai più richiestu.

section.title: Nant’à d’altre piattaforme
section.para: This information applies to any system for a Java version compatible with Java 11 Runtime Environment is available. That includes the platforms described above, as well as platforms for which no specific OmegaT package is provided.
Download the Cross-platform without JRE version.
Spacchittate u schedariu chì vo avete scaricatu. S’azzione hà da creà un cartulare cù tutti i schedarii necessarii per fà funziunà OmegaT.
Seguitate l’istruzzioni di u vostru sistema per installà l’accurtatoghji d’OmegaT in i lochi apposti di a vostra scelta.

section.title: Rinnovà
section.para: OmegaT can tell you when a new version is available. Lighjite e preferenze di per sapene di più.
The changes between your version and the current version are documented in the development site’s changes.txt file.

note.para: S’è vo vulete installà una versione nova, tinite à mente ciò chì seguita :

listitem.para: OmegaT’s preferences are stored in the configuration folder and will not be modified by the new version. See the chapter for details.

Projects that you have created in the past or are currently using will not be modified or deleted. OmegaT projects are not stored inside OmegaT. Sò oggetti indipendenti chì ùn anu micca cunnessione fisica cù l’appiecazione OmegaT.

Parameter files that are included in the downloaded OmegaT package (especially the OmegaT.l4J.ini for Windows and the Configuration.properties and Info.plist files for macOS packages) might be overwritten or deleted, so you may want to create a backup before upgrading, if you have been using these files to modify OmegaT’s launch parameters.
The plugins and scripts folders might be overwritten, so you may want to create a backup before upgrading.

Per fà què, selezziunate semplicemente u cartulare d’installazione attuale cum’è cartulare d’installazione di a versione nova. A versione « anziana » d’OmegaT serà rimpiazzata, ma e preferenze fatte da l’interfaccia OmegaT seranu cunservate in i cartulari di cunfigurazione (lighjite insù).
Què vi permette di cunservà parechje versioni, l’una accantu à l’altra, ciò chì puderia esse desiratu u tempu d’ammaestrà a versione nova.

Tutti i parametri piazzati in u cartulare di cunfigurazione seranu scumparti fora s’è vo indicate un altru cartulare di cunfigurazione cù l’ozzione --config-dir=<chjassu> in l’ozzioni OmegaT pruviste nant’à a linea di cumanda. See the section.
All the parameters located in a project folder will apply to that project regardless of which version of OmegaT opens it.

section.title: Delete OmegaT
section.para: Use your operating system’s standard procedure to remove OmegaT. If you want to remove OmegaT completely, you will also have to delete the configuration folder.
If you performed a manual installation on Linux, you will have to manually delete the OmegaT folders in opt/, as well as the symlinks placed in /usr/local/bin/ by the installation script.
